content.data: The warriors, in anger , marched forward with their contingents and taking out their swords, they bean to strike blows, the heaps of the corpses looked like the mountains lying on the sea-cost for building the dam.421.
(ਇੰਜ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਤ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ) ਮਾਨੋ (ਰਾਮ ਦੁਆਰਾ) ਪੁਲ ਬੰਨ੍ਹਣ ਲਈ ਲਿਆਉਂਦੇ ਪਰਬਤ ਦਿਸ ਰਹੇ ਹੋਣ ॥੪੨੧॥
